title: Rational numbers (as a subset of complex numbers)

blocks.name: cq
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the class of rationals.
blocks.origin: const class cq { ℚ }

blocks.name: diff.cq.s
diff.cq.c
diff.cq.w
df-q
blocks.content: Define the set of rational numbers. Based on definition of rationals in [Apostol] p. 22. See ~ elq for the relation "is rational." (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2002.)

blocks.name: elq
blocks.content: Membership in the set of rationals. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2002.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cq), wrex(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cq), wrex(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, cima(cdiv, cxp(cz, cn))))
  eleq2i(c0, cq, cima(cdiv, cxp(cz, cn)))
  df-q()
  mp2an(wb(wcel(c0, cima(cdiv, cxp(cz, cn))), wrex(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1)))))), wfn(cdiv, cxp(cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wss(cxp(cz, cn), cxp(cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))))
  fnmpt2i(s0, s1, cdiv, cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))
  df-div(s0, s1, hs0)
  riotaex(hs0, cc, wceq(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))
  mp2an(wss(cxp(cz, cn), cxp(cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wss(cz, cc), wss(cn, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  zsscn()
  ssriv(s0, cn, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  sylanbrc(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wne(cv(s0), nat0))
  nncn(cv(s0))
  nnne0(cv(s0))
  eldifsn(cv(s0), cc, nat0)
  xpss12(cz, cc, cn, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  ovelimab(s0, s1, cdiv, cxp(cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cz, cn, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cc, csn(nat0))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  diff.cdif.s(s1, cc, csn(nat0))
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℚ ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(s0[÷]s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ ℚ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(s0[÷]s1))), c0 ∈(÷ "(ℤ × ℕ)))
  eleq2i(c0, cq, (÷ "(ℤ × ℕ)))
  df-q()
  mp2an((c0 ∈(÷ "(ℤ × ℕ))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(s0[÷]s1)))), ÷[Fn](ℂ ×(ℂ \ { 0 })), (ℤ × ℕ)⊆(ℂ ×(ℂ \ { 0 })))
  fnmpt2i(s0, s1, cdiv, cc, (ℂ \ { 0 }), iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(s1[×]hs0)= s0))
  df-div(s0, s1, hs0)
  riotaex(hs0, cc, (s1[×]hs0)= s0)
  mp2an((ℤ × ℕ)⊆(ℂ ×(ℂ \ { 0 })), ℤ ⊆ ℂ, ℕ ⊆(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  zsscn()
  ssriv(s0, cn, (ℂ \ { 0 }))
  sylanbrc(s0 ∈ ℕ, s0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), s0 ∈ ℂ, s0 ≠ 0)
  nncn(s0)
  nnne0(s0)
  eldifsn(s0, cc, nat0)
  xpss12(cz, cc, cn, (ℂ \ { 0 }))
  ovelimab(s0, s1, cdiv, (ℂ ×(ℂ \ { 0 })), cz, cn, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cc, (ℂ \ { 0 }))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cc, { 0 })
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cc, (ℂ \ { 0 }))
  diff.cdif.s(s1, cc, { 0 })
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.cn.s(s1)

blocks.name: qmulz
blocks.content: If ` A ` is rational, then some integer multiple of it is an integer. (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm qmulz(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cq), wrex(s0, cn, wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cz)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cq), wrex(s0, cn, wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cz)), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(s0, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0))))))
  elq(hs0, s0, c0)
  sylbi(wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(s0, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cn, wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cz)), wrex(s0, cn, wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0))))))
  rexcom(hs0, s0, cz, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0))))
  reximia(s0, cn, wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cz))
  rexlimdva(hs0, cz, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cz))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s0)), cz))
  eqeltrd(co(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s0)), cz, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  divcan1d(cv(hs0), cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  zcn(cv(hs0))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  nncn(cv(s0))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wne(cv(s0), nat0))
  nnne0(cv(s0))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cz, co(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s0)), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0))))
  oveq1(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), cz))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm qmulz(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℚ → ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0[×]s0)∈ ℤ))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ℚ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0[×]s0)∈ ℤ), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[÷]s0))))
  elq(hs0, s0, c0)
  sylbi(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[÷]s0))), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0[×]s0)∈ ℤ), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, c0 =(hs0[÷]s0))))
  rexcom(hs0, s0, cz, cn, c0 =(hs0[÷]s0))
  reximia(s0, cn, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, c0 =(hs0[÷]s0)), (c0[×]s0)∈ ℤ)
  rexlimdva(hs0, cz, s0 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[÷]s0), (c0[×]s0)∈ ℤ)
  syl5ibrcom((s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ), c0 =(hs0[÷]s0), (c0[×]s0)∈ ℤ, ((hs0[÷]s0)[×]s0)∈ ℤ)
  eqeltrd(((hs0[÷]s0)[×]s0), cz, hs0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ))
  divcan1d(hs0, s0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ))
  adantl(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(hs0)
  adantr(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℤ, s0 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(s0)
  adantr(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℤ, s0 ≠ 0)
  nnne0(s0)
  simpr(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℤ)
  eleq1d((c0[×]s0), cz, ((hs0[÷]s0)[×]s0), c0 =(hs0[÷]s0))
  oveq1(c0, (hs0[÷]s0), cmul, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 ∈ ℕ)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[×]s0)∈ ℤ)
}

blocks.name: znq
blocks.content: The ratio of an integer and a positive integer is a rational number. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm znq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cq))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cq), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(c0, cdiv, c1)))
  eqid(co(c0, cdiv, c1))
  rspceov(hs0, hs1, c0, cz, c1, cn, co(c0, cdiv, c1), cdiv)
  elq(hs0, hs1, co(c0, cdiv, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cdiv, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdiv)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, cdiv, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdiv)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm znq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ)→(c0[÷]c1)∈ ℚ)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), (c0[÷]c1)∈ ℚ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ,(c0[÷]c1)=(hs0[÷]hs1))))
  mp3an3(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ,(c0[÷]c1)=(hs0[÷]hs1))), (c0[÷]c1)=(c0[÷]c1))
  eqid((c0[÷]c1))
  rspceov(hs0, hs1, c0, cz, c1, cn, (c0[÷]c1), cdiv)
  elq(hs0, hs1, (c0[÷]c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[÷]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdiv)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c((c0[÷]c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdiv)
}

blocks.name: qre
blocks.content: A rational number is a real number. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm qre(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c0, cr))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c0, cr), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))))
  elq(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cr))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)), cr))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wne(cv(hs1), nat0)))
  zre(cv(hs0))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wne(cv(hs1), nat0))
  nnre(cv(hs1))
  nnne0(cv(hs1))
  3expb(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wne(cv(hs1), nat0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)), cr))
  redivcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  eleq1(c0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)), cr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cr))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cr))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm qre(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℚ → c0 ∈ ℝ)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ℚ, c0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1))))
  elq(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1), c0 ∈ ℝ)
  syl5ibrcom((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ), c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1), c0 ∈ ℝ, (hs0[÷]hs1)∈ ℝ)
  syl2an(hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℕ, (hs0[÷]hs1)∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ≠ 0))
  zre(hs0)
  jca(hs1 ∈ ℕ, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ≠ 0)
  nnre(hs1)
  nnne0(hs1)
  3expb(hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ≠ 0, (hs0[÷]hs1)∈ ℝ)
  redivcl(hs0, hs1)
  eleq1(c0, (hs0[÷]hs1), cr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ ℝ)
}

blocks.name: nnssq

blocks.name: qssre

thm qexALT() {
  |- wcel(cq, universe)
} = {

blocks.name: qdivcl
blocks.content: Closure of division of rationals. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm qdivcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cq))

  syl3an(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))

  id(wne(c1, nat0))
  divrec(c0, c1)
  3impb(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cq))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cq), wa(wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cq), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cq))

thm qrevaddcl(class c0, class c1) {

  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cq), wcel(c1, cq))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cq), wcel(c1, cq))
  eqeltrrd(c1, cq, co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cq)))

  ancoms(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), c1))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cq), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), c1), wcel(c0, cc))
  qcn(c0)
  pncan(c1, c0)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cq), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), cq))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cq), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, c0), cq))
  qsubcl(co(c1, caddc, c0), c0)

thm qrevaddcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℚ →((c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ)↔ c1 ∈ ℚ))
} = {
  syl6bbr(c0 ∈ ℚ, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ), c1 ∈ ℚ, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ))
  pm5.32da(c0 ∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℚ)
  impbid((c0 ∈ ℚ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℚ)
  ex((c0 ∈ ℚ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℚ)
  eqeltrrd(c1, cq, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0), ((c0 ∈ ℚ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ))
  adantr((c0 ∈ ℚ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)= c1)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℂ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)= c1)
  sylan2(c1 ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℚ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)= c1, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  qcn(c0)
  pncan(c1, c0)
  adantlr(c0 ∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)∈ ℚ)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ ℚ, (c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ, ((c1[+]c0)[-]c0)∈ ℚ)
  qsubcl((c1[+]c0), c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c1 ∈ ℚ →(c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ))
  expcom(c0 ∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℚ, (c1[+]c0)∈ ℚ)
  qaddcl(c1, c0)
  pm4.71ri(c1 ∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  qcn(c1)
}
